template.name: Samsung SL-C480W by SNMPv2
template.description:
## Overview
Template for color laser printer Samsung Xpress SL-C480W and similiar models

trigger.name: Samsung C480W: Black toner approaching a low level soon
Samsung C480W: Black toner level almost empty
Samsung C480W: Black toner level low

item.name: Samsung C480W: Transfer Belt Level
item.description: Value shows in percent how much of the units life time is remaing.

trigger.name: Samsung C480W: Transfer Belt is almost used
Samsung C480W: Transfer Belt will be worn out in the future
Samsung C480W: Transfer Belt will soon be used up
Samsung C480W: Cyan toner approaching a low level soon
Samsung C480W: Cyan toner level almost empty
Samsung C480W: Cyan toner level low

item.name: Samsung C480W: Friction Separation Pad (Tray 1) Level
item.description: Value shows in percent how much of the units life time is remaing.

trigger.name: Samsung C480W: Friction Separation Pad (Tray 1) is almost used
Samsung C480W: Friction Separation Pad (Tray 1) will be worn out in the future
Samsung C480W: Friction Separation Pad (Tray 1) will soon be used up

item.name: Samsung C480W: Fuser Unit Level
item.description: Value shows in percent how much of the units life time is remaing.

trigger.name: Samsung C480W: Fuser unit is almost used
Samsung C480W: Fuser unit will be worn out in the future
Samsung C480W: Fuser unit will soon be used up

item.name: Samsung C480W: Imaging Unit Level
item.description: Value shows in percent how much of the units life time is remaing.

trigger.name: Samsung C480W: Imaging unit is almost used
Samsung C480W: Imaging unit will be worn out in the future
Samsung C480W: Imaging unit will soon be used up

item.name: Samsung C480W: Device running state: Printer status

trigger.name: Samsung C480W: Device printer status is not OK

item.name: Samsung C480W: Device running status: Error message

trigger.name: Samsung C480W: Device printer status: {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

item.name: Samsung C480W: Total Pages Print Count

item.description: Value shows in percent how much of the units life time is remaing.

Samsung C480W: Waste toner container need replacement now

Samsung C480W: Yellow toner level almost empty
Samsung C480W: Yellow toner level low

macro.description: Create a critical warning if a cartridges fill level / units wear level falls below that value
